family.name: Control Point
family.comment: The Control Point is normally programmed in OPs mode

variable.comment: Writing a value of 170 will reset decoder to factory defaults
variable.label: Manufacturer ID - Reset

display.tooltip: Only change the unit address in Service Mode. Use a 5 digit address from 12000-16383
display.label: Long Address
Long Address

label.text: You may only change the unit address in Service Mode.

display.tooltip: Do not enable if there is a command station attached
display.label: Master Mode
Master Mode

display.tooltip: Remembers state of layout during power down
Reports sensor and output states at GPON
Sets Common Anode or Common Cathode Signals
display.label: Signal Head Polarity

label.text: * Note: Firmware Version 1 or later is required.
Use DecoderPro Version 2.3.2 or later to upgrade.
